solution_line_template: There are ({total_cows}/{ratio_part_divisor}) x {female_ratio_multiplier} = {intermediate_calculation_L1} x {female_ratio_multiplier} = <<{total_cows}/{ratio_part_divisor}*{female_ratio_multiplier}={female_cows}>>{female_cows} females cows in the field.
There are {female_cows}/{male_divisor} = <<{female_cows}/{male_divisor}={male_cows}>>{male_cows} male cows in the field.
There are {spotted_females} - {horned_males} = <<{spotted_females}-{horned_males}={difference_spotted_horned}>>{difference_spotted_horned} more females with spots than males with horns.
